titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (S. 640) for the relief of the city of Dickinson, North Dakota, and for other purposes.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-359.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 263 - 140 (Record Vote No: 374).

bill.summary: 10/8/1987--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of S. 640 (Dickinson Dam project relief).
